injury in pregnant women. To 
protect yourself and your baby, 
always wear your seatbelt with 
the diagonal strap across your 
body between your breasts 
and with the lap belt over 
your upper thighs. The straps 
should lie above and below 
your bump, not over it.
Computer screens
The most recent research 
shows no evidence of a risk 
from visual display units on 
computer terminals and 
word processors.
